scheme_name: Skill Upgradation and Vocational Education Scheme: For Worker's Childrens (P.B.O.C.W.W.B)
description: The Skill Upgradation and Vocational Education Scheme by the Punjab Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board (P.B.O.C.W.W.B) provides financial support to the children of registered construction workers for vocational and skill-based education. The scheme aims to enhance employability through skill development.
key_features: Financial support for vocational and skill-based courses
Covers children of registered construction workers
Promotes skill development and job readiness

benefits.assistance_amount: Varies based on course and board guidelines
benefits.coverage: Course fees, training materials, and related expenses

education_criteria: Students enrolled in recognized vocational or skill-based courses
Courses must be approved by relevant authorities
additional_criteria: Parent must be a registered construction worker with P.B.O.C.W.W.B
Must be a resident of Punjab
institution_criteria: Government or recognized private vocational training institutes in Punjab

eligible_courses_delhi: Vocational courses in IT, mechanics, electrician training, etc.
Skill-based courses approved by state or national skill councils

steps: Obtain application form from P.B.O.C.W.W.B office

special_notes: Limited to vocational and skill-based courses
Assistance amount varies based on course type
Renewal may be required for multi-year courses
